description: Updates and gets site details, and deletes a site.

parent.description: (Optional) Parent site. Required if creating a sub-site under a parent site:

matchType.description:
(Optional) The type of match:
-To match all the filter conditions, provide matchType: ALL.
- To match any one of the filter conditions, provide matchType: ANY.

rules.description:
(Optional) Filter devices with specific attributes:
- Attribute name of device. Example: Name, Operating System. Attribute names change with device types.
- Matching parameter. Supported operators are: Equals, Contains, Not Contains, Starts with, Ends with, Regex. Learn more about Regex.
- Type of resource

actions.description:
- Supported actions 
   - ASSIGN MONITORINGTEMPLATE
   - ASSIGN KNOWLEDGEARTICLE
   - Assign Availability Rule
   - ASSIGN CUSTOMATTRIBUTES
   - Assign Jobs
   - ASSIGN CREDENTIALSET

- Supported values for items for given action
  -  For Assign Availability Rule  , item value is AND 
  -  For ASSIGN CUSTOMATTRIBUTES, item value is tagName[value='tagValue']
  -  For all others this is  number in string eg  "12345"
- Scenarios for Custom attributes item values in response payload
   - New TagName : New Tag created with given Name and Tag Value, and Assigned. - Id of New Tag Value added to response 
   - Old TagName and New Tag Value : New Tag Value added to Tag and Assigned - Id of New Tag Value added to response. 
   - Old TagName and Old TagValue : Both the details are verfied and Assigned - Id of TagValue added to Response

items.title: action
items.description:
Refers to the actions performed on the filtered resources. Select at least one of the following actions:
- Assign Monitoring Templates
- Assign Knowledge Base Articles
- Assign Availability Rule
- Assign Custom Attributes
- Assign Jobs
- Assign Credentials

Examples: "ASSIGN MONITORINGTEMPLATE" and "ASSIGN KNOWLEDGEARTICLE"

resourceType.description:
Type of resource.
Example: DEVICE, VOLUME, VPN, XENSERVER

parent.description: (Optional) Parent site. Required if creating a sub-site under a parent site:

matchType.description:
(Optional) The type of match:
-To match all the filter conditions, provide matchType: ALL.
- To match any one of the filter conditions, provide matchType: ANY.

rules.description:
(Optional) Filter devices with specific attributes:
- Attribute name of device. Example: Name, Operating System. Attribute names change with device types.
- Matching parameter. Supported operators are: Equals, Contains, Not Contains, Starts with, Ends with, Regex. Learn more about Regex.
- Type of resource

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Describes the client ID or msp ID of the tenant
